'''Towering Achievement''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to collect the [[Crimson Agate]] at the summit of Dragonspine.

==Trivia==
* The Chinese name is a reference to the famous poem {{lang|''Gazing at the Mountain''|zh=望岳}} by {{w|Du Fu}}. The last two lines of the poem go: "One day I (too) will mount the highest peak, Where in one glance all other mountains dwindle."<ref>Hsieh, D. (1994). Du Fu's" Gazing at the Mountain". Chinese Literature: Essays, Articles, Reviews (CLEAR), 16, 1-18.</ref>
